title: portugal match : Portugal vs Bosnia Herzegovina Live streaming : Kick - off date , time , predicted 11 , how to watch Euro 2024 Qualifiers
body_text:
Despite Cristiano Ronaldo's transfer to Al-Nassr in Saudi Arabia, he continues to lead as the team's captain. Additionally, Bernardo Silva and Ruben Dias, who achieved success in the UEFA Champions League with Manchester City, have joined the squad.
Portugal vs Bosnia Herzegovina Timings
The match between Cristiano Ronaldo-led Portugal and Bosnia Herzegovina will kick-off on Saturday at 2:45 pm ET. It is scheduled to take place at Estadio da Luz, Lisbon, Portugal.
Portugal vs Bosnia How to watch
The match between Portugal and Bosnia Herzegovina will be available to stream on Vix+ in the US. As per the timings, it will be available at 2:45 pm (ET).
For the fans in UK, it will be available to catch live on ViaPlay Sports and the live streaming will be available on ViaPlay Sports app or website, starting 7:45 BST on Saturday.
Portugal vs Bosnia Possible XI
Possible Portugal XI: Patricio – A Silva, Dias, Danilo – Dalot, Palhinha, Fernandes, Guerreiro – B Silva, Ronaldo, Felix
Possible Bosnia XI: Sehic – Dedic, Ahmedhodzic, Milicevic, Sanicanin, Gazibegovic – Hadziahmetovic, Cimirot, Pjanic – Dzeko, Prevljak
FAQs
- Who is the manager of Bosnia Herzegovina?
Faruk Hadžibegić is the manager of Bosnia and Herzegovina national football team, meanwhile, Edin Džeko serves as the captain. - How many goals did Cristiano Ronaldo score while playing for Al-Nassr?
The star player scored 14 goals in 19 matches playing for Al-Nassr.
